txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Glassy Carapaces from the spiders and gredbyg in the Great River region. Collect them and deliver them to a task-board in Great River to earn favour with the Riders of Stangard.
You have turned in the glassy carapaces for a modest reward at the local task-board.
You have not yet collected enough glassy carapaces to complete your task.
Riders of Stangard Task: Glassy Carapaces
The Rohirrim of Stangard have posted a task to collect glassy carapaces from spiders and gredbyg. They can be turned in at any task-board in Great River.
Deliver the glassy carapaces to any task-board in Great River.
You have accepted a task to acquire glassy carapaces.
Wanted: Glassy Carapaces from the spiders and gredbyg in the Great River region.
